articles.title: Emma Teitel: So you got Pfizer first and Moderna second? That’s OK, experts say: your body doesn’t recognize brand names
articles.description: Doctors are racking their brains for analogies to convince people that mixing vaccines is safe. This has got to stop, says Emma Teitel. The important part is to get two doses without delay. Mix and match Pfizer and Moderna if that’s what’s available to you.
